name: panelkit-ui
description: Custom SCSS-based CSS framework for admin dashboards

scripts.build: npm run prebuild && sass src/scss/main.scss dist/main.css --no-source-map
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run build:min

author: Joydip Paul <joydippaul72@gmail.com> (https://github.com/joydip-paul)
